name: markdownload-tests
description: Test suite for MarkDownload - Markdown Web Clipper

scripts.test:coverage: jest --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='src/**/*.js' --coverageReporters text --coverageReporters lcov --coverageReporters html --coverageReporters json --coverageReporters text-summary
scripts.test:coverage:full: jest --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='src/**/*.js' --coverageReporters text --coverageReporters lcov --coverageReporters html --coverageReporters json --coverageReporters json-summary --coverageReporters cobertura --verbose
scripts.test:hybrid:coverage: HYBRID_TEST=true jest --config jest.hybrid.config.js --coverage --coverageReporters text --coverageReporters lcov --coverageReporters html --coverageReporters json --coverageReporters text-summary
scripts.coverage:baseline: npx jest --config jest.config.coverage.js --testPathPattern='filename|basic-functions' --coverageReporters html --coverageReporters json --coverageReporters lcov && npm run coverage:analyze
scripts.quality:check: npm run test:coverage && npm run lint
scripts.precommit: npm run test:quick && npm run lint
scripts.ci:validate: npm run health-check && npm run test:ci
